country_select.description: Your country selection will ensure that we offer the correct products and payment methods. Please ensure that it corresponds to your country and the account(s) on which you are planning to redeem the product.
country_select.title: Select your country

error.description: Whoops! This is embarrassing, we can't find this page right now. Can you please try again later?
error.help: Please click on the button bellow to return to the homepage or select your country from top menu.
error.title: Page not found

footer.quote: Rapido.com is part of CG | Millions of satisfied customers |

general.critical_error: Something went wrong. Reload the page to try again.
general.label: Rapido
general.look-at-faqs: Take a look at the FAQ's

payment-methods.checkout-options: On Rapido.com, you can checkout with the following trusted payment options. Each payment option will be described below.
payment-methods.paypal_text_1: You can pay with PayPal on Rapido.com. After selecting this payment option, you log into your PayPal account and confirm the payment. Next, the transaction is processed.
payment-methods.paypal_text_2: Upon receipt of payment, the top up voucher code is sent immediately.
payment-methods.visa_and_mastercard_text_1: On Rapido.com, you can pay via VISA credit card, VISA debit card (Delta and Electron) and MasterCard. At the checkout, you select payment by credit card. Then you enter your credit card details, including the card holder, the card number, expiration date and CVV code. Then confirm payment.
payment-methods.visa_and_mastercard_text_2: Upon receipt of payment, the top up code is sent immediately.
